>Construction of pLYC10
acquire oligo ZH1			
acquire oligo ZH1R
acquire oligo ZH2
acquire oligo ZH2R
acquire oligo ZH6
acquire oligo ZH6R
acquire plasmid pLYC5
acquire plasmid pAtipiTrc
PCR ZH1,ZH2R on pLYC5	(3293 bp, pcrA)
PCR ZH2,ZH6R on pLYC5	(3683 bp, pcrB)
PCR ZH6,ZH1R on pAtipiTrc (1349 bp, pcrC)
Assemble pcrA,pcrB,pcrC	(Gibson, pLYC10)
Transform pLYC10	(Mach1, Amp)
